dataList.dlg: Meursault. Please refer to me as such, Manager.
The company rules say that its employees are to get up at designated hours. It appears most Sinners are unaware of this fact, and so are you.
If you ask me how I intend to spend my afternoon… No rules state what to do.
If I had to compare the times of day against each other, I prefer day to night. Darkness obscures vision, and what is hard to see is hard to understand.
Do you have any business with me, Manager? If there is a particular reason, do make it clear.
People suggest that I smile more often. Do you want that as well, Manager?
…You continue to speak with me. Are you encouraged by the rules to do so?
I shall wait here until you return.
Yes, if that is what you want.
If the rules say so.
Is there a problem, Manager?
I shall execute the order according to the rules.
I am awaiting your next order.
Ugh!
Done accordingly.
Please take care of this by the rules.
I made it.
I failed.
I simply followed orders.
It’s what should have been done; compliments are redundant.
I implore you to revise the strategy.
